scripts.start-data-source-location-ldes-1-446-to: yarn clean-docker && yarn start-mongo && node initialize_ldes.mjs -p 1 -l 446 -s 'location-LDES' && yarn start-benchmark-server
scripts.start-data-source-location-ldes-20-10-to: yarn clean-docker && yarn start-mongo && node initialize_ldes.mjs -p 20 -l 10 -s 'location-LDES' && yarn start-benchmark-server
scripts.start-data-source-ship-ldes-1-100000-top: yarn clean-docker && yarn start-mongo && node initialize_ldes.mjs -p 1 -l 100000 -s 'ship-LDES' && yarn start-benchmark-server
scripts.benchmark-follow-all: (rm ./benchmark/output -f && touch ./benchmark/output && export COMUNICA_CONFIG='./benchmark/config_comunica_follow_all.json'; (node ./comunica-feature-link-traversal/engines/query-sparql-link-traversal/bin/http.js http://localhost:3000/ldes/test -p 5000 -t 60 -i -l info -w 1 --lenient) &> ./benchmark/output) & (export COMUNICA_CONFIG='./benchmark/config_comunica_follow_all.json' && (sleep 5 && node benchmark.mjs && fuser -k 5000/tcp))
scripts.benchmark-follow-tree: (rm ./benchmark/output -f && touch ./benchmark/output && export COMUNICA_CONFIG='./benchmark/config_comunica_follow_tree.json'; (node ./comunica-feature-link-traversal/engines/query-sparql-link-traversal/bin/http.js http://localhost:3000/ldes/test -p 5000 -t 60 -i -l info -w 1 --lenient) &> ./benchmark/output) & (export COMUNICA_CONFIG='./benchmark/config_comunica_follow_tree.json' && (sleep 5 && node benchmark.mjs && fuser -k 5000/tcp))
scripts.benchmark-follow-tree-solver: (rm ./benchmark/output -f && touch ./benchmark/output && export COMUNICA_CONFIG='./benchmark/config_comunica_follow_tree_solver.json'; (node ./comunica-feature-link-traversal/engines/query-sparql-link-traversal/bin/http.js http://localhost:3000/ldes/test -p 5000 -t 60 -i -l info -w 1 --lenient) &> ./benchmark/output) & (export COMUNICA_CONFIG='./benchmark/config_comunica_follow_tree_solver.json' && (sleep 5 && node benchmark.mjs && fuser -k 5000/tcp))
scripts.clean-docker: docker stop $(docker ps -a -q) && docker container prune
